ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Hunting at 25
ygData.msgSnippet: ... while! ... break. ... Or ... I strongly urge you to fight in dungeons with a group.  Eshew safe , easy experience places for the most part. Try to find a
ygData.messageBody:
>Here is a question then. I've been groving from 20 to 25 in the lake of ill
>omen, easy exp, I only die now when...well, I haven't died in quiet a
while!
>The down side is...bored. Ran a shadow knight from 1-8 just to take a
break.
>Tonight my lv 25 enchanter will be at Castle Mistmoore for the Halloween
>bash (Our guild, the Nameless of Norath, on the nameless server, is hosting
>a server wide raid). I need somewhere interesting and good for growth to
>hunt. But with enough people to not spend a long time standing around
>looking for a group. Should I stay in Castle Mistmoore? Or go else where?
Or
>what?
>
>Vroc, Enchanter on the Nameless

I strongly urge you to fight in dungeons with a group. Eshew safe , easy
experience places for the most part. Try to find a regular group that plays
at the same time you do and hit places that will test and sharpen your crowd
control skills! You will need these skills later in life. Mistmore is good
because its dangerous :) Unrest, Sola, Cazik-Thule and Guk all come to mind
in the old world.

Sandoz Phamacueticals
Illusionist lvl 53
Tovonnilious
